to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: He paused again, mustering his strength and thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 他又停下來，集中力量，聚精會神。

sentences.english: My eyes fell on Jiang Xin, who sat in a corner, listening attentively.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在一個角落，聚精會神地聽着。

sentences.english: Concentrated study will help you to retain knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 聚精會神的學習有助於使所學的知識永記不忘。
聽衆都在聚精會神地聽着。

sentences.english: My sons watch intently as the rich colors of the sunrise soar into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 兒子們聚精會神地望着日出時那噴向天空的繽紛色彩。

sentences.english: A line of people are listening Qingjian jujube development intently.
sentences.chinese: 一行人聚精會神的聽着清澗紅棗的發展歷程。

sentences.english: The audience are absorbed in listening.
sentences.chinese: 聽衆都在聚精會神地聽着。

sentences.english: "Poly-mind" is only the one which is an attitude for changing this world.
sentences.chinese: “聚精會神”是唯一，一種改變世界的態度。

sentences.english: We will continue to dedicate ourselves to development and focus our attention on promoting economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 我們將繼續聚精會神搞建設，一心一意謀發展。

sentences.english: He watched breathlessly the spider attempt to spin its web for the third time.
sentences.chinese: 他聚精會神地看蜘蛛企圖第三次結網。

sentences.english: Making a model ship absorbed him completely.
sentences.chinese: 造模型船使他聚精會神。

sentences.english: Doing some thing sedulously is a course understanding and practice hard.
sentences.chinese: 聚精會神地做某件事是項經過一番瞭解與苦練的。

sentences.english: When when sowing, everybody is sedulous listen.
sentences.chinese: 等到播的時候，大家都聚精會神的收聽。

sentences.english: The projectionist was panning the camera attentively .
sentences.chinese: 放映員在聚精會神地移動攝影機。

sentences.english: Look, just how creative girl who Qijiang attentively.
sentences.chinese: 瞧，這位綦江小姑娘創作得多麼聚精會神。

sentences.english: This boy concentrates on his studies as he sits next to his father in the living room.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩在客廳裏坐在他父親身邊，聚精會神的學習。
